subject: Accidents and Safety
Automobile Racing
lead_paragraph: An wreck that hurt Kyle Busch’s standing in the Chase for the Sprint Cup has reignited a debate about how drivers who are not eligible for the championship should race drivers who are.
snippet: An wreck that hurt Kyle Busch’s standing in the Chase for the Sprint Cup has reignited a debate about how drivers who are not eligible for the championship should race drivers who are.
